yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /

des ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ma lags pa/ gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /des ye shes de chos nyid kyi nang du

yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos nyid ma lags pa/

gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /des ye shes de chos kyi dbyings kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos kyi dbyings kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes
de chos kyi dbyings kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos kyi dbyings ma lags pa/ gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /des ye shes de chos kyi
gnas nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid kyi phyi nang

du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos kyi gnas nyid ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /des ye shes de chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma

mthong / ye shes de chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos skyon myed pa nyid kyi phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de chos skyon myed pa nyid ma lags pa

gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /des ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i

mtha'i phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ye shes de yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo / /rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu ba phreng ba can mos par gyur te/ de ltar mos par gyur

nas/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te/ de de ltar mos par gyur nas des chos gang yang

mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / yid la bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su bzung bas mchis te/ chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis/ gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba 'am/ gtang bar bgyi ba de lta bu'i chos

gang yang des mi dmigs/ chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar gang chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i

slad du/ gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / 'du shes yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad

yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ myig yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / sna yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / lce yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / lus yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / yid

yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / sgra yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / dri yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / ro yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / reg yongs su

myi 'dzin pa dang / chos yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i rnam par

shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su

bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi

'dzin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor

ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su

myi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/

sa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chu'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / mye'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rlung gi khams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin pa

dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du / ma rig pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su

myi 'dzin pa dang / mying dang gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / skye mched drug yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / sred pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / len pa yongs

su myi 'dzin pa dang / srid pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / skye ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rga shi yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs

su myi 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi

pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs

su myi 'dzin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / don dam stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / 'dus byas stong

pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa

nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa

nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba

ma mchis pa'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su

bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ dbang po rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs

su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ stobs rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams yongs

su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang /

chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ tshad med pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos

thams yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ rnam par thar pa rnams yongs

su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad

du/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang /

chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos

thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin

pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ snying rje chen po yongs su myi 'dzin

pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i

'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad

du/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis

pa'i slad du/ rang byang chub yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ lam gyis rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i

slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ de bzhin nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis

pa'i slad du/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su

bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos kyi dbyings yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung

ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos kyi gnas nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos skyon myed pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su

bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su myi 'dzin pa 'di ni/ pha rol ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa/ 'on kyang smon lam yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/ dbang po lnga yongs su ma rdzogs/ stobs lnga yongs su ma rdzogs/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
yongs su ma rdzogs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/ bsam gtan bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/ tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/

gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su ma rdzogs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma

myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su ma rdzogs/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma rdzogs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma

rdzogs/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su ma rdzogs/ snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du bar ma dor

yongs su mya ngan las myi 'da'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam rnams ni smon lam ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba ma lags/

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ma lags/ dbang po rnams ni dbang po ma lags/ stobs rnams ni stobs ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag ma lags/ 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan ma lags/ tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad

myed pa ma lags/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags/ rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni

mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa ma lags/

ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ma lags/ myi 'jig pa rnams ni myi 'jigs pa ma

lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa ma lags/ snying rje chen po rnams ni snying rje chen po ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma lags te/

de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/ chos ma lags pa yang ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / 'du shes

yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ myig yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang /

sna yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / lce yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / lus yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / yid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / sgra yongs

su myi 'dzin pa dang / dri yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / ro yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / reg yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ myig gi rnam par shes pa

yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin

pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang /

sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su

ma bzung ba'i slad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin

pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos

thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ sa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chu'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / mye'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rlung gi khams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / nam mkha'i

khams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ ma rig pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / 'du byed yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par

shes pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / mying dang gzugs yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / skye mched drug yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / reg pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / sred pa yongs su myi 'dzin

pa dang / len pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / srid pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / skye ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rga shi yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang /

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / phyi stong pa

nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang /

'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin

pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang /

myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang /

chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin

pa dang / dbang po rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / stobs rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang /
chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang /

gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i

sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su

myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang /

snying rje chen po yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang /

lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rang byang chub yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / lam gyis rnam

par shes pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du/ de bzhin nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / ma nor ba de bzhin

nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi gnas nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / chos

skyon myed pa nyid yongs su myi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su myi 'dzin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig /ci'i phyir zhe na de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhes yongs su brtag par ni bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i tshe/ gal te 'di ltar chos gang yod pa ma yin zhing myi dmyigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/

tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang rnams myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa

nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /

thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa

stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong

pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang myi dmyigs

pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /

'du byed myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang don dam pa

stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /

sna myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce myed cing myi dmyigs so/ lus myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong

pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang /

rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs

myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sgra myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dri myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ro myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /reg myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chos myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid

dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa

nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po

myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig gi rnam par shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /

lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po

stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong

pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg

pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ tshe dang ldan pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang /

dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /

sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i

rkyen kyis tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /

'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa

nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sa'i khams myed cing mi dmigs so/ /chu'i khams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i

khams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams myed cing mi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang /

phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /

thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa

nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ma rig pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs myed cing myi

dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa myed cing mi dmigs so/ /len pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba myed

cing myi dmigs so/ /rga shi myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /

'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong

pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa

nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa

nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po rnams myed cing myi dmyigs

so/ /stobs rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang /

phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma

dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang

smon pa myed pa myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams

myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po rnams myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myed cing myi

dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /

'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong

pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong

ba'i 'bras bu myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang byang chub myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lam gyis rnam par shes pa nyid myed cing

myi dmyigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam

pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos

thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin nyid myed cing myi dmyigs

so/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chos nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi gnas nyid myed cing myi dmyigs

so/ /chos skyon myed pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /

chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang /

rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

kyi phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dgra bcom pa yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyang myed cing myi dmyigs

so/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyi dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ phyi stong

pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid

dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chen po stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ don dam pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/

'dus byas stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i

phyir/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams

cad stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/
